item.description:
I'm personally very excited about this one.. I haven't had a vegan brunch in.. well, ever! Note that there is a time change for this event, from 11-2ish. I hope this is not an inconvenience to anyone. Please feel free to bring breakfast, lunch or dessert food to this, anything goes.

As always please call me with any questions or suggestions, 508-459-1074. See you there!!

Stephen
item.how_to_find_us: Dreads, glasses and a whole lot of veganess :)
item.name: Vegan Brunch in Worcester!!
